PHRASE.LANG: It's a good thing you have that cool top on, because these pants don’t breath at all. However, they are quite difficult to stain. [#Legal]
Heureusement que vous portez un haut léger, car ce pantalon est une véritable étuve. Il a néanmoins l'avantage d'être peu salissant. [#Legal]
Gut, dass Sie das kühlende Top anhaben, denn diese Hose ist absolut nicht atmungsaktiv. Dafür wird sie nicht schmutzig. [#Legal]
Al contrario della maglietta leggera, questi pantaloni non garantiscono certo il massimo della traspirazione. Però non si macchiano facilmente... [#Legal]
Menos mal que llevas ese top tan fresco, porque esos pantalones no transpiran nada. Eso sí, tampoco se manchan fácilmente. [#Legal]
機能性を優先したズボン [#Legal]
시원한 상의를 입고 있는게 다행이다. 이 바지 속에서는 공기가 전혀 통하지 않는다. 물론 방수가 잘 되는 점은 다행. [#Legal]
It's a good thing you have that cool top on, because these pants don’t breath at all. However, they are quite difficult to stain. [#Legal]
由於褲管不透氣，穿起來非常舒服。然而卻不容易髒。[#Legal]
由於褲管不透氣，穿起來非常舒服。然而卻不容易髒。 [#Legal]
It's a good thing you have that cool top on, because these pants don’t breath at all. However, they are quite difficult to stain. [#Legal]
